welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Glenville, where small town charm meets breathtaking scenery. Get ready to experience our rich history, outdoor adventures, and local hospitality. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that our charming city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schenectady County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Schenectady County Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Albany International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Albany International Airport is primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
